shortcv.p: Ioanna Talanti graduated from the Department of Management Science and Technology at the Athens University of Economics and Business with a specialization in Information Systems Management. She is now attending the MSc in Technology Education and Digital Systems from University of Piraeus.

She has worked at the Marketing Department of Papasotiriou S.A. as an instructor of employees. From 2005 until 2006 she worked as a research assistant for the e-business research team Eltrun at AUEB. From 2007, she works as a research assistant in ISTLab/OIS research group. She has participated in various research projects. She currently works on the Benchmarking Study on European Policies and Initiatives to support E-learning in Enterprises, commissioned by the European Commission - DG Enterprise and Industry. Her research interests are on the e-learning field as well as on the Human Resource Information Systems.
